QuestData.Title: Ears Are Burning
QuestData.Description: Captain Pentigast has made no secret of his disdain for the Burning Blade at Thunder Axe Fortress.$b$bSurely, proof of their demise would be of value to him.
QuestData.RewardText: Ears of the Burning Blade?$b$b<Captain Pentigast smiles.>$b$bWell done, $c. This is just a shadow of what will soon become of that vile cult!
